channel.title: Comments for page "Quiet Rain"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Quiet Rain"

item.title: Tab length
item.content:encoded:
Hey there, if you setup your tab format like this you can stop the tabs from going over your charcter stats

 [[div style="width:80%"]] [[tabview]] [[tab enter_text]] enter_text [[/tab]] [[/tabview]] [[/div]]
